issue.title: world frame not accessible on field in local setup

content.raw:
Thanks Steven. As per my observation on the setup here, ROS_IP and ROS_MASTER_URI are set on both the computers. ROS is running fine, if I run turtlebot simulator, I can operate everything. more info on /tf returns the following. It looks like ihmc controllers are using localhost instead of the computer name. I changed the network seetings file in ~/.ihmc folder but that didn't help

```
#!bash

Type: tf2_msgs/TFMessage

Publishers: 
 * /ihmc_ros/valkyrie/controller (http://127.0.0.1:41974/)
 * /hand_state_publisher (http://******.wpi.edu:40177/)

Subscribers: 
 * /rviz_1494374349709759614 (http://******.wpi.edu:45397/)

```
